alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Clay; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, northeastern Tallapoosa, northwestern Chambers and southeastern Clay Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goldville, or 10 miles southeast of Ashland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke, Lineville, Ashland, New Site, Wadley, Goldville, Hillabee Creek, Malone, Abanda, Crystal Lake, Penton, Trammel Crossroads, Sparkling Springs, Daviston, Dickert, Cragford, R.L. Harris Dam, Horseshoe Bend National Military Park, Tennant and Horseshoe Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Alabama.
